articles.description: Under-display selfie cameras are now a reality
articles.content: Does your smartphone feature a notch, a punch-hole or even a pop-up camera? Selfie cameras are one of the most divisive elements of modern smartphones, and it may be that one day these are dropped wi… [+3807 chars]
